apihelp-query+redirects-param-mirror: Help displayed in the API for the rdmirror parameter
fork: Form heading for Special:Fork, also used as button text on Special:Fork.
logentry-delete-fork: Log entry used when forking a page without importing revisions; this effectively deletes the page locally.
logentry-delete-mirror: Log entry used when restoring mirroring to a page that has been deleted locally.
logentry-import-fork: Log entry used when forking a page and importing remote revisions.
mirror: Form heading for Special:Mirror, also used as the button text on Special:Mirror.
wikimirror-action-fork: Text displayed in the tab which allows users to make a local copy of a mirrored page for editing.
wikimirror-action-mirror: Text displayed in the navigation menu which allows users to restore the mirrored version of a page.
wikimirror-api-error: {{optional}} Error message added to server logs when an error is encountered. This message is not exposed to users.
wikimirror-config-assignknownusers: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgWikiMirrorAssignKnownUsers. This message is not exposed to users.
wikimirror-config-cachedirectory: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgWikiMirrorCacheDirectory. This message is not exposed to users.
wikimirror-config-remote: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgWikiMirrorRemote. This message is not exposed to users.
wikimirror-config-searchmaxresults: {{optional}} Description of the configuration variable $wgWikiMirrorSearchMaxResults. This message is not exposed to users.
wikimirror-delete-success: Success message displayed when a page is forked without importing any revisions.
wikimirror-fork-title: Header displayed on Special:Fork, $1 is the title of the page being forked.
wikimirror-import-success: Success message displayed when a page is forked and revisions were imported.
wikimirror-mirror-history: Message displayed when a user visits the history page of a mirrored page. $1 is the URL of the remote wiki's history page.
wikimirror-mirror-success: Success message displayed when a page is mirrored.
wikimirror-mirror-title: Header displayed on Special:Mirror, $1 is the title of the page being mirrored.
wikimirror-mirrored: Hover text for the icon displayed at the top right of mirrored pages. Clicking the icon takes the user to the remote site.
wikimirror-no-action: Message displayed to users when they attempt to perform a disallowed action with a mirrored page, such as protection or moving.
wikimirror-no-edit: Message displayed to users when they click View Source to view the wikitext of a mirrored page.
wikimirror-no-mirror: {{optional}} Error message added to server logs when an error is encountered. This message is not exposed to users. $1 is the name of the page.
wikimirror-nofork-text: Error message displayed when the page cannot be forked.
wikimirror-nofork-title: Header displayed when the page cannot be forked.
wikimirror-nomirror-text: Error message displayed when the page cannot be mirrored.
wikimirror-nomirror-title: Header displayed when the page cannot be mirrored.
